1.0.name: wordpress/lastfm-smartlinks
1.0.description:
Use this plugin to add automatically updated Last.fm SmartLinks lists for your sidebar.

You can add widgets to display your most listened to Artists or Albums on Last.fm (username required), or the Top Artists across the whole site. You can also make money by adding your affiliate IDs for Amazon, eBay, and Google.

Last.fm SmartLink Widgets:

  • Automatically update: these widgets update automatically via RSS, bringing fresh content to your blog on a regular basis
  • Enable discovery: each item in the widget includes a SmartLink that pulls together the best information from around the web for the artist or album directly to your site
  • Are Easy to install: see the simple installation instructions below
  • Fit your blog: the widget's settings make it easy to customize the widget to fit your blog
  • Generate revenue: links within the SmartLink pane can be monetized via Amazon, Ebay, and Google affiliate IDs
